summary: A retextureing of all 22 of the shields in Matherian\'s Viking Shields Set.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE!: This is a retexturing ONLY! You will still need to download the meshes folder and the main esp from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20217]Matherian Viking Shields Set[/url]

This is a retexturing of Matherian\'s Viking Shields Set as a non-replacing texture file. I have changed it so that the shields now have a circular pattern to them and look more like a battle worn and weathered shield, and albeit, while not entirely realistic; they still look cool. 

For anyone dissatisfied with the circular pattern, I will be uploading a simple straight board retex that will look more like Matherian\'s original, but still higher quality. As for the back part of the shield, I couldn\'t get it any better than what you\'ll see, due to the smallness of the original dds.

These textures are currently 2048x1024. I will put out a lower quality version when I finish the straight board retex. If anyone has a request put it out within the next 2 days.

CREDITS
=========
(Matherian Viking Shields Set:)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20217

(Upon Request:)
mtwitalia.freeforumzone.leonardo.it/

(Free Use Textures Provided by:)
http://www.cgtextures.com/
author: Tier1Dusty
